fields.title: Make the home page "pop"
fields.description: The boss says he wants the home page to "pop", whatever that means.

fields.title: Make everything prettier
fields.description: Could you use a different theme? This one is blinding.

fields.title: Add TPS reports
fields.description: Did you get the memo? I'll make sure you get a copy of that memo.

fields.title: Downgrade the boss to Windows XP
fields.description: The boss says he doesn't "get Windows 10" and instead of going back to Windows 7 he'd prefer to go straight back to Windows XP. Grab a old PC from the closet and upgrade him by the end of the week.

fields.title: Add sortable columns to reporting software
fields.description: The reporting software is almost done. Make sure the columns are sortable.
